header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: (NOT IN ORDER) food and drink, healthcare, clearing out, moving house, TV, stag/hen parties, social history, interior design, event-management, religion, Thirsk, other people, gardening, technology, auctions
header.activity: Stopping for a coffee after going to the tip
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, advising, requesting, inviting, announcing, anecdote telling, making arrangements, telling jokes
